item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Roméo Dallaire
item.description: "I know there is a God because in Rwanda I shook hands with the devil. I have seen him, I have smelled him and I have touched him. I know the devil exists and therefore I know there is a God." -- Roméo Dallaire

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "A man can live and be healthy without killing animals for food; therefore, if he eats meat, he participates in taking animal life merely for the sake of his appetite. And to act so is immoral." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Raymond Priestley
item.description: "For scientific discovery, give me Scott; for speed and efficiency of travel, give me Amundsen; but when you are in a hopeless situation, when you are seeing no way out, get down on your knees and pray for Shackleton" -- Raymond Priestley

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "There might be things more terrible even than losing someone you love by death." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Whenever I hear anyone arguing for slavery, I feel a strong impulse to see it tried on him personally." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "[author:Frederick Douglass|18943] taught that literacy is the path from slavery to freedom. There are many kinds of slavery and many kinds of freedom, but reading is still the path." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Jennifer Weiner
item.description: "This is motherhood for you,' said my own mother. 'Going through life with your heart outside your body." -- Jennifer Weiner

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "A mother knows what her child's gone through, even if she didn't see it herself." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by James Watson
item.description: "I am happy that I can aid those admirable men, both living and dead, who by their pens or their tongues have aided the great cause of human liberty and universal happiness." -- James Watson

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "Introverts, in contrast, may have strong social skills and enjoy parties and business meetings, but after a while wish they were home in their pajamas. They prefer to devote their social energies to close friends, colleagues, and family. They listen more than they talk, think before they speak, and often feel as if they express themselves better in writing than in conversation. They tend to dislike conflict. Many have a horror of small talk, but enjoy deep discussions." -- Susan Cain

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Chris Rock
item.description: "You know, some people say life is short and that you could get hit by a bus at any moment and that you have to live each day like it's your last. Bullshit. Life is long. You're probably not gonna get hit by a bus. And you're gonna have to live with the choices you make for the next fifty years." -- Chris Rock

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description:
"And the Witch tempted you to do another thing, My son, did she not?”
“Yes, Aslan. She wanted me to take an apple home to mother.”
“Understand, then, that is would have healed her, but not to your joy or hers. The day would have come when both of you would have looked back and said it would have been better to die in that illness.”
And then Diggory could say nothing, for tears choked him and he gave up all hopes of saving his mother’s life; but at the same time he knew the Lion knew what would have happened, and that there might be things more terrible even than losing someone you love to death." -- C.S. Lewis
